title: R42737
content: This report presents data on U.S. arms sales agreements and deliveries to major purchasers from 2004-2011. It includes total dollar values of arms agreements and deliveries to the top five purchasers in different regions for the specified years. The information is based on official figures from the United States Defense Department compiled by the Defense Security Cooperation Agency (DSCA). The curr_chunk provides data on U.S. defense articles and services sold to top purchasers globally and regionally under the Foreign Military Sales program. It includes total dollar values of agreements and deliveries for specified years, excluding commercial licensed deliveries. The curr_chunk provides delivery totals of U.S. defense articles and services to top 10 purchasers worldwide under the Foreign Military Sales program for specified years.
